channel.title: Make a phat
channel.description:
how can i make it that when i use a dye on a chef hat it make a phat like when i use item 1774 (purple dye) on a chef hat (we will use an example number 3) it makes a purple phat (xx)
would it be else if item 1774 used on 3 make xx or something can someone help

item.title: Make a phat
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

if you add me on skype my username is god.pure and my email is god.pure@live.co.uk I can make a code so when you use shears on chefs hat it makes white party hat and when you use dye on a white party hat it turns into another colour.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a phat
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

It’s right what u was saying
just
useitem (your dye ID) on hatID
additem phatID

This is what I should use (I’m using delta) just convert to pi if u are using pi

if(((itemUsed == dyeID) && (otherItem == hatID))){
deleteItem(dyeID, getItemSlot(dyeID), 1);
deleteItem(hatID, getItemSlot(hatID), 1);
addItem(phatID, 1);
sM("You made a Purple party hat.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Make a phat
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

usman555:

To check your base, simply go to the area of where you downloaded the base from and check the details of the page. It will usually tell you in the title, but if not, then skim the page. If you still can’t find it, reply to the page with your question.

Your alive? O.O

If it’s a PI (probably is), look in ItemOnItem.java or some shit like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a phat
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Please be more specific if you would like assistance in the server difficulties you are experiencing.

In fact, the more information you give, you better help you get!

So for starters, please notify that we server helpers need to know the revision you are using. It can be 317, 508, 474, and whatnot.

And not just that, all servers are different, even if they have a same revision!

So unless you are a professional and made your own base, please include the base you are using. Deltascape, Project Insanity, …?

Read full topic
